thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Short Break
thread.title_full: Short Break - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Stuart D
title: Short Break
text:
My wife and I stayed here in February 2017. We arrived later than planned as there had been heavy snowfall. Check in was quick and easy, we dumped our bags and took a short walk to Times Square.
Our room on the 3rd floor was quiet and very comfortable there was no view but as we only slept in there it didn't matter... The only criticism is that even with the heating off it was still a little warm.
